p: Onto 96-well plates, THP-1 monocytes were plated at a density of 4 × 10 4 cells per well (in 200 volume) in the presence or absence of plant extracts, and plates were incubated at 37 °C, 5% CO 2 for 72 h. Then Alamar Blue was added, during the last 3 h of incubation, cell viability was measured fluorometrically as described previously. 17
